title: An Act to ensure the safety of students, faculty and staff on the campuses of state colleges, community colleges and state universities

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Feeney, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1700) of Paul R. Feeney for legislation to ensure the safety of students, faculty and staff on the campuses of state colleges, community colleges and state universities.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/10/2025 from 1:00 PM-5:00 PM in A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
